snippet: The W.K. Kellogg Foundation is giving $40 million to prevent the sale of Detroit art and help city retirees, raising the pool of money to $370 million....

headline.print_headline: Kellogg Foundation to Help in Detroit Bankruptcy
headline.main: Kellogg Foundation to Help in Detroit Bankruptcy

lead_paragraph: The W.K. Kellogg Foundation is giving $40 million to prevent the sale of Detroit art and help city retirees, raising the pool of money to $370 million.
